name: SPACE ARKANOID 3D
description:
Welcome to the ultimate Space Arkanoid 3D remix.
Shoot all rocks with the ball and keep the ball in play with your paddle. Move the paddle with your finger.
Try to complete all levels.

Features:
- 50 original hand-crafted levels (new levels added weekly)
- the space control on the screen,
- destructible blocks & indestructible shields ,
- colourful graphics that will leave you hungry for more,
- movable & static types of bricks - beautiful high resolution graphics
